question: Find the last three digits of the product of the positive roots of $\sqrt{1995}x^{\log_{1995}x}=x^2.$
solution: Okay, so I need to find the last three digits of the product of the positive roots of the equation √(1995) * x^(log_{1995} x) = x². ... [full step-by-step derivation omitted for brevity] ... Therefore, the final answer is \boxed{025}.
